animals.name: fox
animals.story:
In the woods, a sly fox goes,
Look at it. Go. Go. Go.
With fur red and eyes so bright,
It hunts at night and out of sight.

animals.name: rabbit
animals.story:
Hop, hop, hop,
The rabbit won' stop.
With long ears and fluffy tail,
It jumps and jumps without fail.

animals.name: frog
animals.story:
In the pond,
a frog does dwell, 
Jumping high, and croaking as well. 
With eyes wide 
it waits for a fly, 
Leaping swiftly, reaching the sky.

animals.name: mouse
animals.story: The mouse is in the house

animals.name: dragon
animals.story: The dragon soars. The dragon roars.

animals.name: pig
animals.story: The pig loves to run to the mud.

animals.name: panda
animals.story: I see a panda. It eats a tree.

animals.name: bear
animals.story: The bear snores on the cave floor.
